Frequency once per hour.

Requirements You are photon-attuned.

You call upon the cosmic force that created the universe, unleashing a blast of purging cosmic fire that reverts all things to their basic components and overcomes even magical defenses. This fills a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] and deals @Damage[(max(10,@actor.level - 5)d6)[fire]] damage with a @Check[type:reflex|against:class] save against your class DC. You and any number of selected adjacent allies are unaffected by this blast.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, @Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]] damage, and you can attempt to counteract a spell on the creature, using half your level, rounded up, as the counteract rank.

Level (+1) Increase the damage by 1d6.
